Percentage of cases that contain a missing values.

Calculate the percentage of cases (rows) that contain a missing value.

miss_case_pct(data)

Arguments

data

a dataframe

Value

numeric the percentage of cases that contain a missing value

See also

miss_case_prop miss_prop_summary() miss_case_summary miss_case_table miss_summary miss_var_pct miss_var_prop miss_var_run miss_var_span miss_var_summary miss_var_table

Examples


miss_case_pct(airquality)
#> [1] 27.45098
